resources.string: Save files opened by this app.
Save files shared by other apps.
Please select a folder for saving files.
(The path might not be displayed in a recognizable form. Tap on it if you wish to change it.)
(Error: Permission expired. Please re-select the path.)

1. When this application is picked for opening or sharing a file after set up, it will store the file into the selected folder and exit. However, this app will show up in the menu for picking apps only when the corresponding check box is selected.
2. It might take time (or a reboot, or two) for this to be fully functional (That is, to be able to work with all your apps, or most of the apps.) after installed for the first time.
Error: Permission expired. Please re-select the path.
